thread.section_title: Entertainment and Leisure Businesses For Sale in the US
thread.title: Seed Cleaning Facility For Sale

title: Seed Cleaning Facility For Sale
text: Questions Business Summary This business has provided a much-needed service to its community for over 60 years. The current owners purchased and have maintained the business for the community's good and have achieved an excellent quality of life while doing so. Currently the business focuses on cleaning small seed grains for local farmers for planting the following season; this leaves much expansion room if a new owner wanted to add retail of farm-related products. Come check out this great opportunity in a wonderful agricultural area of northeast Montana today! The establishment is priced to include $100,000 in equipment, $5,000 in fixtures and furnishings, other assets totaling $55,000, and the buildings valued at $100,000. Ask for portfolio #193. Financials
